data.prayer: Father, help the 8,253 believers in Gisborne to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gisborne, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Gisborne, New Zealand a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Gisborne with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, help the 8,253 believers in Gisborne to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 38,446 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Burmese people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Over 48.95 percent of the people of Gisborne are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, please convict the believers in Gisborne, New Zealand to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Gisborne, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
